content.rendered:
Welcome to PK Tailored Home Care

Live in you own home, your familiar environment, with compassionate carers of your choice

Discover more
Book An Appointment
15+

Years of Experience

About Us

PK Tailored Home Care

PK Tailored Home Care services is an Introductory Agency specialising in providing bespoke, Self employed Live in Carers, who are trained and ready to meet your specific needs in the comfort of your own home. This, we believe empowers you to choose carers of your choice as well as manage the care contract the way it best suits you.

We believe that every individual deserves to live with dignity, comfort, and independence, no matter their age or health condition. Our mission is to provide personalised, compassionate, and professional care in the comfort of your own home.

Our home care support services are designed to ease the stress of caring for an elderly or disabled loved one, without requiring you to make the difficult choice of moving them into a care home. When you engage PK Tailored Home Care, you can be rest assured that your loved one’s daily needs will be met with warmth, respect, and compassion.
Why Choose Us

Certified Care Professionals

PK Tailored Home Care services is run and managed by a group of Specialist Nurses. We are passionate about nursing and caring for others. It is our calling! In our team, we also have experienced carers, home care assistants, certified nursing aides, and support staff dedicated to ensuring your loved ones receive the highest quality of care. With many years of experience in the care sector, we understand the importance of trust, reliability, and compassion in the services we provide.

Enhanced Quality of Life

We are committed to helping your loved ones enjoy the highest possible quality of life. We never compromise on care, compassion, or trust.

Peace of Mind for Families

We understand how difficult it is to see a loved one struggle. With us, you can have complete peace of mind knowing that we are here for every need.

Emotional and Mental Wellbeing

We recognise that emotional and mental wellbeing is just as vital as physical health, and we are here to provide full support in every way.

Personalised Care for Your Loved Ones.

Every person is unique, with individual needs and circumstances. That’s why we tailor our care services to suit you and your loved one, ensuring they receive the very best.
Discover more
What we offer

Experience the finest in professional, compassionate home care with us

Live-in Care

Round-the-clock support within the comfort of home. Our trained carers live with your loved one, ensuring they receive constant care, safety, and companionship.

Learn More
Dementia Care

Specialised support for individuals living with dementia or Alzheimer’s. Our carers are trained to provide patient, understanding, and dignified care.

Learn More
Companion Care

From a friendly chat to helping with daily tasks, our companion care services ensure your loved one never feels alone. We offer emotional support, encouragement.

Learn More
Elderly Care

Professional, compassionate support designed to meet the everyday needs of older adults. From personal care to assistance with mobility.

Learn More
Respite Care

Short-term care to give families and primary carers a much-needed break. Whether it’s for a few hours, days, or longer, we step in so you can rest.

Learn More
Supported Living

Helping individuals with additional needs live independently with the right level of assistance. We provide personalised care plans to promote choice, dignity.

Learn More
Make an appointment

For Independent Seniors We Make Living Easy.

From independent older adults to those with disabilities or ongoing health conditions, our in-home services make life easier. Fill out the form below to let us know how and when we can assist you.

Why Choose Us

We treat every client like family, ensuring their comfort, safety, and wellbeing are always our top priorities. At PK Tailored Home Care, we help your loved ones maintain independence for as long as possible.
Personalised Care Plans

Services tailored to each individual’s unique needs.

Qualified and Compassionate Staff

Our carers are trained, certified, and passionate about providing quality care.

24/7 Availability

We’re here whenever you need us, with around-the-clock support.

Trusted and Accredited

Licensed, insured, and dedicated to the highest standard of care.

Testimonial

Client Feedback & Reviews

Mark Wilson
PK Tailored Home Care’s professional nurses took wonderful care of my family members, giving me complete peace of mind.
Sophia spencer
Their services are excellent – they care just like family. Highly recommended!
Noah Smith
After an accident, all I wanted was the comfort of home. The PK Tailored team were so caring, and their in-home services were the best support I could have asked for.
